thread.title: Video of a tour bus veering off motorway and colliding with trees in France
thread.title_full: Video of a tour bus veering off motorway and colliding with trees in France | Daily Mail Online

author: Jake Polden For Mailonline
title: Video of a tour bus veering off motorway and colliding with trees in France
text:
19 shares 11
View
comments
This is the dramatic moment a driver lost control of a tour bus and crashed into the trees alongside a motorway, hospitalising two people on board.
The driver is believed to have fallen asleep at the wheel moments before the incident took place, which was caught on camera by a passenger in France.
The tour bus was taking people to Paris from Holland when a person on board noticed that the driver was straddling the white line between two lanes of traffic.
Dutch tour bus loses control after driver falls asleep The tour bus was on a motorway to Paris when one of the passengers noticed that the driver was straddling the white line between two lanes
Walking to the front of the bus, the video maker recorded the vehicle swaying in the motorway from the front windscreen
Rather worryingly the clip shows that the driver is seemingly unaware of the fact that the bus isn't positioned correctly within the driving lane.
 Next The agony caused by just one piece of plastic thrown into... Cyclist filmed jumping SIX red lights along one mile stretch... River of flame: Fire erupts across Russian waterway and huge... The eagle has landed! Incredible footage captures the moment... 19 shares Suddenly the vehicle begins veering to the right slightly and before long it approaches the hard shoulder at speed.
Panicking, the video maker appears to make an effort to alert the driver and momentarily begins recording the ground.
The driver is believed to have fallen asleep at the wheel of the bus moments before it veered off the motorway at high speed
The video maker appeared to make an effort to alert the driver and momentarily began recording the ground as the bus veered off the road
The bus then collides with something alongside the road and the front seat passenger can be seen bouncing around in her seat and screaming.
Although difficult to make out, the windscreen of the bus looks to have shattered as a result of the crash.
The video concludes with the bus eventually coming to a stop â€“ it is unclear how much damage the vehicle has sustained.
Writing online after posting the video the internet, the filmmaker said: 'We were on our way to Paris for a small vacation with a tour bus.
Although difficult to make out, the windscreen of the bus looks to have shattered as a result of the crash
Two passerngers were later taken to hospital after the crash but the extent of their injuries is unclear
'When the driver started to use two full lines I started to record him to show him how dangerously he was driving.
'Exactly at that moment he lost control of the bus. Luckily no one died and only two people went to the hospital.'
The extent of the injuries sustained by the two passengers on board is unclear.
